# Bio 
Cong Fan is a medical and MPH student at the Cleveland Clinic Lerner College of Medicine at Case Western Reserve University. Her interests include statistics, oncology and disparities research.

# Education

* **Doctor of Medicine**, Cleveland Clinic Lerner College of Medicine, Cleveland, OH (2020-Present, anticipated 2025)

* **Master of Public Health**, Concentration in Population Health Research, Case Western Reserve University, Cleveland, OH (2020-Present, anticipated 2025)

* **Bachelor of Arts in Biology, Concentration in Molecular and Cell Biology; Bachelor of Arts in Anthropology**, Cornell University, College of Arts and Sciences, Ithaca NY (2012-2016)
